current_task: Deploy Apple Music station fix - THE REAL FIX!
message: FOUND THE BUG! APIs are working and returning data (Macklemore, Johnny Cash, The Cranberries). Problem was: stations have artist name in 'name' field not 'artistName'. Added getArtistFromItem() helper. Please deploy f591938.
feature_summary: Fix artist extraction from Apple Music stations

technical_details.root_cause: Apple Music stations store artist in 'name' field, not 'artistName'
technical_details.fix: getArtistFromItem() helper that handles stations vs albums vs songs correctly
